name: Orbiter (itch) (JosefAnhede)
description:
ORBITER

A 1v1 multiplayer space-ship fighter, battle your friend to the death in a randomly generated solar system.

CONTROLS

Player1:

WASD - Movement & Rotation

Space - Shoot

Player 2:

Arrow Keys- Movement & Rotation

Right Shift - Shoot

Misc:

Escape - Quit game

R - Restart

PLANNED:

Sound

Music

Asteroid Belts

Ship Trajectories

Feedback is greatly appreciated!
